name: ltools
summary: Tools to help with localising an iOS app.
description: Tools to help with localising an iOS app.  Currently this is a header file (L.h) with some convenience macros, and a script (L.sh) to check whether all your keys are included in your strings files.  Use of L.sh requires the installation of 'ack'; if you have homebrew installed you can do this with 'brew install ack'.
